An **ESG controversy** is a document (tweet or article) which has a sentiment score below -70% (and passes our filtering criteria).

![](/cms/media/cleanshot-2022-04-01-at-10.38.26-2x.png)

The Governance risk score is simply the % of Governance-related controverses within the total Governance document corpus of a specific company.

**Governance RISK Score \[%] = ∑ (Controverses) / ∑ (Documents)**

*ex: company A has a total of 300 documents, 100 of which are classified as belonging to the Governance main topic, 4 of these articles have sentiment scores below -70% which results in a 4% risk score.*

To learn more about how the sentiment scoring works, visit [this link](https://coda.io/@wequity-app/wequity-methodology-101)
